mapper.select: SELECT emp_no, emp_pw, emp_name, emp_gender, emp_regno, emp_foreig, emp.dept_cd, emp.emp_rank, emp_level, emp_hp, emp_email, emp_add1, emp_add2, emp_hire, emp_workse, emp_loginse, enabled, noti_list, dept.dept_name, code.cd_name FROM emp LEFT OUTER JOIN dept ON emp.dept_cd = dept.dept_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN code ON emp.emp_rank = code.cd_cd where not emp.dept_cd is null order by emp_hire desc

SELECT emp_no, emp_pw, emp_name, emp_gender, emp_regno, emp_foreig, emp.dept_cd, emp.emp_rank, emp_level, emp_hp, emp_email, emp_add1, emp_add2, emp_hire, emp_workse, emp_loginse, enabled, noti_list, dept.dept_name, code.cd_name FROM emp LEFT OUTER JOIN dept ON emp.dept_cd = dept.dept_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN code ON emp.emp_rank = code.cd_cd where not emp.dept_cd is null and emp_workse = 1
select emp_no, to_number(substr(emp_no, 8)) as empCustomNo, dept_cd from emp where emp_no like '%'||#{dept_cd}||'%' order by 1 desc

SELECT emp_no, emp_name, emp_gender, emp_regno, emp_foreig, emp.dept_cd, emp.emp_rank, emp_level, emp_hp, emp_email, emp_add1, emp_add2, emp_hire, emp_photo, emp_sign, emp_loginse, noti_list, dept.dept_name, code.cd_name FROM emp LEFT OUTER JOIN dept ON emp.dept_cd = dept.dept_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN code ON emp.emp_rank = code.cd_cd where emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE emp SET DEPT_CD = #{deptCd}, EMP_RANK = #{empRank}, EMP_LEVEL =#{empLevel} WHERE emp_no = #{empNo}
